original_text: And as for their appearance, the four had the same likeness, as if a wheel were within a wheel.
korean_text: 그 모양은 넷이 꼭 같은데 마치 바퀴 안에 바퀴가 있는 것 같으며

sentences.original_text: the four had the same likeness,
as if a wheel were within a wheel.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 바퀴 안에 바퀴가 있는 것 같았다.
